deposit().notice: Everyone can deposit funds into the contract Emits a Deposited event

i_manager().notice: 1. Management employee: CRUD (address, salary, status) 2. Deposit/Withdraw: Owner can deposit and withdraw funds 3. Payroll: Owner can run payroll to pay employees based on their salary 4. Tracking history: Owner can track the payment history of each employee
